details.sectionContent: Learn and test your SQL skills in easy way with joy and fun.

Input (provided to candidate) : - Bowl filled with jumbled SQL code answer cheats,Procedure: Students has to pick up one of cheat and match the answer and write proper SQL query in the sheet. Output: Volunteers and event members will check the answer and declare the winner groups. Total group winner (5-7 teams) will eligible to perform round 2 events.
Every student will perform the given task within stipulated time period. Winner will be declared as individual 1-2-3.

Date: 21/02/2018 
Round 1: 11:30 AM to 12:00 PM (MCA Department[C-116/117]) 
Round 2: 1:00 PM to 1:45 PM (MCA Department[C-116/117])
